column5: So that's the temple of Heimmel...
It looks like the Power of Stars
Zext might have not reached the altar yet.
...If we hurry, we should be able to catch up to them!
It has been a while, Noi.
It seems that you have been purposely getting
in our way and meddling in our affairs...
Hmph, you certainly have strange tastes.
Before that, we will take back the
Master Gear from you here and now!
I haven't "come" to shut it down.
Ah, the Power of Stars stopped...!!
I will take you two out
Is that all you have to offer,
You have no connection to anything
I do have a connection with it!
If I had the Master Gear,
If it's the Master Gear you want,
it remains in the altar on the top floor...
It was never an obstacle to our "plan"
whether the Master Gear is taken or not.
I forgot to give my name.
Our mission is to restore the
Noi, do you have any idea about this─
...If it really is Selam under that mask...
Then he might be a Mythos...
Why is Master Selam helping Zext?
For now, we should take the Master Gear
Let's go to the altar, Nayuta!
